name: Capcom DC
description: Eight of Capcom's hit digital titles are available in one collection at a great value.  These titles pack the same features – HD, Online gameplay and more -  as the original releases!  Included are:  Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix, 1942: Joint Strike, Bionic Commando Rearmed 2, Final Fight Double Impact (with Magic Sword), Flock!, Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo HD Remix, Rocketmen: Axis of Evil (with It Came From Uranus expansion), and Wolf of the Battlefield: Commando 3.
